title: Macbook A1502 Three Beeps
message:
Hello,
I have a Macbook A1502. The machine gives a 3 beep sound when turned on. RAM ISSUE. The Ram Chips are soldered onto the board. Is there any way to solve this ?

title: Macbook A1502 Three Beeps
message:
More likely CPU issue than RAM.

BTW, you've forgot to specify the board model.
A1502 model may have 3 different boards.
